Player History
Drafted in 9th round, 103rd overall pick, by New York in 2019...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2019, off Pablo Ordoñez (MIN)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/8/2019, off Moises Jones (WAS)...
Injured on 6/1/2019 with a Pulled Groin Muscle, out for one week...

Had 27-game hitting streak snapped on 9/2/2019...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Baltimore on 9/20/2020...
1/31/2021: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,142,857 through salary arbitration...
